column2: "Na banyin no soɛree dɛ ɔrokɔ; na n'asew no hyɛɛ no

column4: ka w'akoma to mu

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ aber a banyin no soɛree dɛ ɔrokɔ no
column4: na no nwewe no

column13: hom ntsintsim anadwe yi nyinara: hwɛ
column16: ma w'akoma ntɔ wo yamu; na ɔkyena asoɛr ahanamakye esi hom kwan do

column2: "Na banyin no ammpɛ dɛ otsintsim anadwe no
column4: na okodur Jebus a ɔnoara nye Jerusalɛm no ne tsentsendo: na nsoasopɔnkɔ ebien a wɔahyehyɛ hɔn ka no ho; no nwewe no so ka no ho."

column3: nna tserɛ adze asa; na akowaa no see no wura dɛ

column3: Yɛremman nnkɔ ɔnanaben a ommfi Israelmba mu no kurow mu; mbom yerutwa mu akɔ Gibea."
Bra ma yɛmbɛn nkurow yi mu kor; na yɛnkɛda Gibea
column4: anaa Rama."

column2: "Nna wotwaa mu kɔr hɔn kwan; na iwi kɔtɔr hɔn wɔ Gibea a ɔyɛ Benjamin dze no nkyɛn."
"Na wɔmaan hɔ dɛ wɔrokɔ akɛda Gibea: na ɔkɔree
column3: na ɔkɛtsenaa kurow no n'abɔntsen do: osiandɛ nyimpa biara ammbɛfa hɔn annkɔ ne fie dɛ wɔnkɔsoɛ hɔ."

column4: akɔdaa bi fi n'edwumayɛ mu wɔ haban mu baa ewimbir no; na nyimpa no fi Efraim nkokodo nkurow no mu na ɔaba Gibea ahɔhotsena: na ekuromfo no dze wɔyɛ Benjaminfo."

column3: na ohun banyin ɔkwantsennyi no wɔ kurow no n'abɔntsen do; na akɔdaa no see dɛ

column3: Yefi Bɛtlɛhɛm-juda rutwa mu akɔ Efraim nkokodo nkurow no ne nkyɛnmu no ho; hɔ na mifi
column4: na mokɔr Bɛtlɛhɛm-juda: na afei morokɔ EWURADZE fie; na nyimpa biara mmbɛfaa me nnkɔsoɛɛ ne fie yi."

column2: "Naaso efuw na edziban nyina wɔ hɔ dze ma hɛn nsoasopɔnkɔ; na boodoo na nsa so wɔ hɔ ma emi

column3: Asomdwee nka wo; ɔtse dɛn ara a ma w'ehiadze nyinara nda mo do

column2: "Na mbanyin no ammpɛ dɛ wobetsie no: nna ɔbarimba no suoo no nwewe no mu
